resp = client.search(
    index="books",
    retriever={
        "linear": {
            "query": "elasticsearch",
            "fields": [
                "title",
                "description",
                "title_semantic",
                "description_semantic"
            ],
            "normalizer": "minmax"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
